summary: An email from an FBI agent coordinating interviews of Bureau of Prisons personnel regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). It details the logistics for interviewing staff, including serving subpoenas and arranging locations to avoid press.

persons.name: B P
persons.context: Mentioned in the subject line as the subject of an interview, likely a Bureau of Prisons employee related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Coordination of BOP personnel interviews
events.description: FBI agents coordinate interviews of Bureau of Prisons personnel regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death, with some interviews requiring subpoenas.

keyFacts: The email coordinates interviews of Bureau of Prisons personnel following Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.
Three interviewees are to be served with subpoenas upon conclusion of their interviews.
Interviews are being arranged at 290 Broadway to avoid press camped at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
One specific interviewee in the Bronx wrote a memo regarding Epstein needing a cellmate.
